message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs. I believe it could greatly enhance your business operations. Let's discuss how we can make this valuable asset work for you. To get started, I propose an initial offer of $15000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. However, given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $14000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. While I understand your budget constraints, I must maintain the integrity of our product's value. I am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer is $14500.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of your product and my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $14000.
Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position, but I must respectfully decline. My final counteroffer is $14200.
I appreciate your efforts in negotiation, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $14000.
Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. After careful thought, I am willing to accept your last counteroffer of $14000. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects both our positions.
